word:
I would give my love to all your family, especially your parents. Let us hear from you often. Don't sink down in despondency and doubt. Look up, be of good cheer, and God will lead us on to victory.--Letter 27, 1861, p. 3. (To Lucinda Hall, June 19, 1861.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. April 5, 1979
